comments: She is an awesome professor!!!. If you already know spanish it will be easy but if you don\'t it can be a challenge. Mrs. Zapata can move through the material very quickly at times, so do not fall behind. Overall, I enjoyed her class but be prepared to do presentations in front of the class and of course one of the presentations must be in spanish.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Inspirational (4)  Caring (2)  Respected (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I had Mrs. Barajas-Zapata for Spanish 101, and she was by far the BEST Spanish teacher that I\'ve had! She\'s an easy-going teacher, very patient. She gives homework from the book, and two presentations due at the end of the semester. All of the homework that she expects from you is in the syllabus so there\'s no surprises.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Inspirational (4)  Caring (2)  Respected (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I took Mrs. Zapata for both 101 and 102 . She is a great teacher. She is willing to help you out if you don\'t understand certain assignments. Her SI Astrid is real helpful too. If you are already a Spanish speaker these two classes should be easy for you. I took 102 online and it was very easy.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Inspirational (4)  Caring (2)  Respected (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Excellent professor. A lot of course work, but she is very gracious as long as you put in some good effort. The text book is NEEDED. No pop quizzes or huge unit tests given. However, everything you do is weighted heavy. She has great communication open for the students. Only take her if you want to learn Spanish, otherwise you\'re wasting time!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Inspirational (4)  Caring (2)  Respected (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Mrs. Zapata is a great teacher for spanish 101. Her and her assistant astrid are very helpful. I\'m taking her for 102. It\'s a must you do all the assignments. If you don\'t get it ask her or her assistant for help or find a spanish speaking classmate to help you out. I recommend her to anybody trying to take spanish 101.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Inspirational (4)  Caring (2)  Respected (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Easiest class ever for spanish speakers, non spanish speakers. Beginner class online. Do all the assignments and she will notice your work. Do online activities by due date no slacking. Show up to first meeting, project powerpoint, and do all forums, test all in Espanol Muchachos. Shes helpful. Last Exam half your grade. Easy A.

comments: One of my favorite teachers. she is clear in her lectures. easy assigments. a lot of students get annoyed with her because she is always chipper and likes to call on people for class interaction but other than that she is a sweetheart. she loves to give her help and assistance. shes from colombia and speaks great spanish and okay english.
